@k2heikkila @bphogan @NetlifyCMS @Netlify Yeah this is exactly what @NetlifyCMS was intended to enable. - Use any static site generator - Author in markdown if you like - Give a nice authoring experience, invisibly using git behind the scenes - Developers work how they want.
